Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag and System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

Docs.summary: Define uma interface que permite que a extensão dos comportamentos específicos de um designer de controle HTML.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior> interface está obsoleta. Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.
